DOC.brief_summary: The investigators propose to conduct a large clinical study to determine if daily bathing with chlorhexidine impregnated cloths will reduce the incidence of healthcare-associated infections in the Pediatric Intensive Care Unit (PICU).
DOC.brief_title: Study of Bathing With Chlorhexidine Impregnated Cloths on Nosocomial Infections in the Pediatric Intensive Care Unit
DOC.criteria: Patients in pediatric intensive care unit Patients with a history of an allergic reaction to chlorhexidine Patients less than 2 months of age Patients with severe skin disease or burn Patients with an indwelling epidural catheter or lumbar drain
